ItemGroupDef.Name: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?
Over the <u>last 2 weeks</u> how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? <i>(Click the circle to indicate your answer)</u>

ItemDef.Name: ts_authorized_participants
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: A list of participants who may join

ItemDef.Name: ts_chat_room_participants
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: A list of participants who may join

ItemDef.Name: ts_pre_survey_list
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: A list of surveys to be taken before session

ItemDef.Name: ts_post_survey_list
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: A list of surveys to be taken after the session

ItemDef.Name: location
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: Include name, address, city, state, zip and any unit/apartment information if applicableormation

ItemDef.Name: sc_gad1
ItemDef.redcap:SectionHeader: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?

Question.TranslatedText: 1. Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
2. Not being able to stop or control worrying
3. Worrying too much about different things
5. Being so restless that it's hard to sit still
7. Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?

ItemDef.Name: phq9_1
ItemDef.redcap:SectionHeader: Over the <u>last 2 weeks</u> how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? <i>(Click the circle to indicate your answer)</u>

Question.TranslatedText: 1. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
3. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
4. Feeling tired or having little energy
6. Feeling bad about yourself -- or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
7. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite -- being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
9. Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: If you checked off <u>any</u> problems, how <u>difficult </u> have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
